entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as he consults his watch and gives instructions to Miss Granger.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is mentioned as she receives instructions from Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as he repeats Miss Granger's question and tries to understand what they are supposed to do.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as she pulls out a gold chain from her robes and gives instructions to Harry.

entities.name: midnight
entities.description: Midnight is mentioned as the time when Dumbledore says they should be locked in.

relationships.description: Dumbledore gives instructions to Miss Granger about what they need to do.
Hermione gives instructions to Harry about what they need to do.
